title: YouTube is turning 20! “Unbox” some of the latest features to celebrate.
description: Today is YouTube’s 20th birthday! It’s hard to believe two decades have gone by since this 19-second clip started it all. To celebrate, here are three new features that …
excerpt: Today is YouTube’s 20th birthday! It’s hard to believe two decades have gone by since this 19-second clip started it all. To celebrate, here are three new features that help you get the most out of YouTube:Create a personalized radio station on YouTube using Ask Music, available on iOS and Android for all YouTube Premium and YouTube Music users. English-language subscribers in select countries can fine-tune their sonic adventures now and we’ll be expanding soon.Go even faster through videos: 4x playback speed is rolling out. YouTube Premium members on mobile devices can now enjoy expanded playback speed options above 2x.Get ready for a TV viewing upgrade this summer! Easier navigation, playback, quality tweaks, plus streamlined access to comments, channel info and subscribing are heading to your screens.Find more facts, features and tips on the YouTube blog.

html:
Today is YouTube’s 20th birthday! It’s hard to believe two decades have gone by since this 19-second clip started it all. To celebrate, here are three new features that help you get the most out of YouTube:

  1. Create a personalized radio station on YouTube using Ask Music, available on iOS and Android for all YouTube Premium and YouTube Music users. English-language subscribers in select countries can fine-tune their sonic adventures now and we’ll be expanding soon.
  2. Go even faster through videos: 4x playback speed is rolling out. YouTube Premium members on mobile devices can now enjoy expanded playback speed options above 2x.
  3. Get ready for a TV viewing upgrade this summer! Easier navigation, playback, quality tweaks, plus streamlined access to comments, channel info and subscribing are heading to your screens.

Find more facts, features and tips on the YouTube blog.
